name: append-to-file
title: Append Text to File
description: Append text to markdown/text files quickly. Either select text from clipboard history or enter text to append without opening files, and was built with AI-assisted development.
author: brusik

commands.name: append-clipboard-to-file
commands.title: Append Text from Clipboard to File
commands.subtitle: Append Text to File
commands.description: Pick an entry from the clipboard history and append it to a file.

commands.name: append-text-to-file
commands.title: Append Text to File
commands.subtitle: Append Text to File
commands.description: Edit text before appending to a file.

commands.name: quick-append-clipboard-to-last-appended-file
commands.title: Quick Append Current Clipboard Text to Last Appended File
commands.subtitle: Append Text to File
commands.description: Append latest clipboard text entry to the last appended file.

commands.name: undo-last-append
commands.title: Undo Last Append
commands.subtitle: Append Text to File
commands.description: Revert the most recent append operation.

commands.name: open-last-appended-file
commands.title: Open Last Appended File
commands.subtitle: Append Text to File
commands.description: Open the most recently appended file.

preferences.name: roots
preferences.title: Root Directories
preferences.description: Comma or newline separated directories to search.

preferences.name: allowedExtensions
preferences.title: Allowed Extensions
preferences.description: Comma or newline separated extensions to allow (for example: .txt,.md,.markdown,.yaml,.yml, etc.).

preferences.name: searchExcludes
preferences.title: Search Excludes
preferences.description: Comma or newline separated names/patterns to ignore while searching (for example: .git,node_modules,archive/*).

preferences.name: searchMaxDepth
preferences.title: Search Max Depth
preferences.description: Maximum depth under each root to search (0 = root only).

preferences.name: separatorRule
preferences.title: Separator Rule
preferences.description: How entries are separated when appending.

preferences.name: customSeparator
preferences.title: Custom Separator
preferences.description: Used when separator rule is Custom. Supports \n and \t.

preferences.name: ensureTrailingNewline
preferences.title: Ensure Trailing Newline
preferences.label: Keep one trailing newline after append
preferences.description: Keep one newline at end of file after append.

preferences.name: timestampFormat
preferences.title: Timestamp Format
preferences.description: Used by the Append with Timestamp action.

preferences.name: defaultInsertPosition
preferences.title: Default Insert Position
preferences.description: Where new text is inserted when appending.
